content.rendered:
Latest Series

Following the life of Osman Gazi he struggles to found and control the Ottoman Empire.
SEASONS: 4 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH KURULUS OSMAN
The story of the life of SELAHADDIN, A Muslim ruler who aimed to unite the Muslim lands in Syria, Northern Mesopotamia, Palestine.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH SELAHADDIN EYYUBI
the life of one of the most important rulers in Ottoman history, Fatih Sultan Mehmed.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH Mehmed Fetihler Sultani
Mahmud is a sharp sword; one edge bears justice, the other, mercy. A tale of a servant who walked in the footsteps of kings…
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH AZIZ MEHMUD HUDAYI
The epic stories of historical heroes who have become legends through their struggles are presented in Legends of History!
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH Legends of history
It depicts the life and triumphs of Sultan Alparslan, the 2nd sultan of the Seljuk dynasty, whose victories expanded the empire.
SEASONS: 2 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH alp arslan
In 13th-century Anatolia, as the Mongol threat looms and internal turmoil rages, Rumi emerges to assuage people’s fears.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
watch mevlana rumi
kif is a historical Turkish mini-web series produced by Kirli Kedi, and directed by Selahattin Sancaklı.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
watch AKIF
The story of Jalaluddin Manguberdi, the last Khwarazmshah of the Turkic Anushteginid dynasty who defeated Mongols in many battles.
SEASONS: 2 – URDU SUBTITLES
watch Mendirmen Jalaluddin
Abdulkadir Geylani and Esref, who met during their journey, will set off for Baghdad together.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH hay sultan
When Aksemseddin accepts the tutorship of Sehzade Mehmed, the epic story of both Mehmed and Aksemseddin will begin.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
Watch Kizil Elma
The life story of Avicenna, philosopher of the Islamic Golden Age. watch now on hadaf play.
SEASONS: 1 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH ibn e sina
The series tells the adventures of Ishak, Oruc, Hizir, and Ilyas fighting high tides and the secrets of the seas in pursuit of the holy secret.
SEASONS: 2 – URDU SUBTITLES
WATCH barbaroslar
